374260.name: Retro Game Crunch Soundtrack
374260.description:
The complete 7 game soundtrack for Retro Game Crunch. Includes 90 tracks of authentic chiptunes written by 8bitmatt. Most of these tracks were written using MML and audio was recorded directly from a real Nintendo Entertainment System!

Bonus album included: Music from the three day jam game Beat Drop and, what it eventually turned into, the 4th Retro Game Crunch game Wub-Wub Wescue.
